extendedInfo.description: If you have ever coached soccer team its chaotic enough trying to make sure the kids are in the right positions.  You shouldnât have to worry if everyone is getting equal playing time.  The Soccer Rotation Station will help to make sure that the kids are in the right position at the same time making sure that you donât have one kid spending too much on the sideline!  The app vibrates and blows a whistle at you when itâs getting time to rotate your players, you then line them up and tell them who they are going in for and you wait.  When the time is right, you send them in while pressing the rotate button and their off!Define Your own PositionsSwitch Positions (New)Set your own formations (5 vs 5, 6 vs 6 and so on)Substitute Players (New)Mark Goals and Assists for each playerAdd Blocks and Steals (New)Define your own positionsCreate your team and add your players on a website (By directional sync coming soon). (New)Keep track of opposing teamâs goalsBrighter Clock (New)Game statistics with a summary of each playerâs âon fieldâ time including goals and assists.Rate Players so that you donât have all of the weak players on the field at the same time (New)

reviews.title: Foundation for a useful app
reviews.comment: Until you can dictate your own rotation this app is not what we really need.   No coach is going to use some random rotation beyond U6 if even that.  First step is the ability to assign player to position(s) and then rotate only with players in their position, i. e.  midfielder for midfielder.   Ultimately,  the ideal app would allow a coach to designate the entire rotation in pre-game then when it comes time for subs the app let\'s the coach know who is going in for who.
reviews.author: Nick Guerrero

reviews.title: Great but Limited App
reviews.comment: I agree with Nick, I have kids with 7 years soccer experience and others who are relatively new to soccer and each kid has their own strength, however I need the ability to put players where I think they would be the best strength for the team.  This would be great if you could put players in groups such as forwards, mids, defenders and then it would rotate based on the groups. So I could rotate and who was playing as a forward can also rotate to a defender, but if a player is strongest as a defender, the app would not rotate and put them as a striker/forward.  Thanks...almost there, I am looking forward to the next release but until then I have to keep searching.
reviews.author: Jeff Brohamer

reviews.title: Nearly there
reviews.comment: When the game is on play if I have 7 players and 5 on pitch: I can only see 3 field players and 2 substitute \"on the bench\" on the screen below the game time and the time before rotation. Probably need to make the font used by the app smaller or suppress decorum so that all fit on the screen. For example the 4th screenshot above is not what I have. the bottom players names are cut off
reviews.author: Jean-Yves Tillier

reviews.title: Only good for u-6
reviews.comment: Can\'t pick your starting line and won\'t let you pick player positions it\'s all random.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs some fixes
reviews.comment: This app is ok - but there\'s no option to \"quit\" or \"logout\". About 30 min after I\'m done using it I get an alert that it\'s still running and would I like to shut it down.  Also - would like the rotate option at all times - not just within the alert window based on alarm timing.  The ability to rotate one player would also be nice but not a must.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Will not work
reviews.comment: The app will not start the game, it just stops working.
reviews.author: Tony Murguia

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Random rotation useless.  Can\'t assign positions.  I can\'t just put anyone anywhere at random.
reviews.author: Greg Brown

reviews.title: Thanks, works perfectly
reviews.comment: Great app. Helped out significantly on the field. A snap to set up and run. Easy to change out players and adapt lines. I use it for an under 10 team. Frees up time to focus on the game.
reviews.author: Ed Rafferty

reviews.title: Not there yet
reviews.comment: As others have said, the random rotation makes this app pretty much useless for anthing other than U6 IM. It would be a 5 star for us with the following modifications: Goalies tend to rotate by half in our league so being able to define a pool of Goalies per game and then rotate them based on the length of the game. Second is to predefine postitions by game. The ideal would be to define a players primary position and secondary list of positions that player is eligible in rotation. Make it work for 5 stars.
reviews.author: Rob Silsby

reviews.title: Need some bugs fixed
reviews.comment: When pause and switching to next quarter, clock doesn\'t restart. New feature: please show the play time for each player in real time. It is the best soccer app for coaches on Android. Unfortunately that is not good enough yet. Please support tablets by allowing landscape mode.
reviews.author: Augusto Cardoso

reviews.title: Great for soccer dad
reviews.comment: Has lots of features. Does what it says it will. Great dev that wants to make it better. Takes the worries and planning off your plate so you can coach your team!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Coaching Tool
reviews.comment: Does it simple and right. Better than that paper with pencil smears all of it.  Great tool for any coach.  Waiting for Basket Ball app next.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This has great potential and the developer has been very quick to respond.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I would really have preferred the ability to assign both my own starting positions (random today) and who rotayes where.  Only paid a buck but I wish this was disclosed in the description.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: It would be helpful to have a feature that would allow coaches to determine which players may not be affected by the rotation. Example: the reward for my two daughters is to play the whole game because one of them is the goalie in the first half and the other takes over that spot in the second half.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must own i\'m minor soccer coach app!
reviews.comment: Great app, and developer responds to suggestions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SO helpful! No soccer coach should be without this
reviews.comment: This is a FANTASTIC app!  This is my first time coaching my daughter\'s recreational soccer team and I have no experience with soccer so it is challenging to keep up with the game MUCH LESS trying to keep track of who needs to play which position next and who has been sitting out too much and trying to keep it all fair!  That has proven to be the most challenging part of coaching, but not with this app!  It even reminds you that it\'s almost time to rotate (based on your settings of how early to remind you) so you can warn the players to be ready to rotate in soon.  The app is very customizable - allowing you to add custom positions, team and player names, games, amount of players present to play, etc.  EVERY COACH NEEDS THIS APP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes!
reviews.comment: I can\'t even add a team in order to use the app. Everytime I tap the button to do so it crashes. Would love a refund.  Using an Asus T3000.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, developer responds to suggestions
reviews.comment: Wanted some things added and he responded in a timely fashion and got those features added. No crashing, works great on my phone. All soccer coaches should get this one... must have.
reviews.author: A Google User
